+---
+id: 68dc7593a29e5c7621d873ee
+title: "Dialogue 1: I'm Tom"
+challengeType: 21
+dashedName: dialogue-1-im-tom
+---
+
+# --description--
+
+Watch the video below to understand the context of the upcoming lessons.
+
+# --assignment--
+
+Watch the video.
+
+# --scene--
+
+```json
+{
+  "setup": {
+    "background": "chaos.png",
+    "characters": [
+      {
+        "character": "David",
+        "position": {"x":50,"y":80,"z":8},
+        "opacity": 0
+      }
+    ],
+    "audio": {
+      "filename": "1.1-1.mp3",
+      "startTime": 1,
+      "startTimestamp": 5.7,
+      "finishTimestamp": 6.48
+    }
+  },
+  "commands": [
+    {
+      "character": "David",
+      "opacity": 1,
+      "startTime": 0
+    },
+    {
+      "character": "David",
+      "startTime": 1,
+      "finishTime": 0.78,
+      "dialogue": {
+        "text": "I'm Tom.",
+        "align": "center"
+      }
+    },
+    {
+      "character": "Tom",
+      "opacity": 0,
+      "startTime": 1.28
+    }
+  ]
+}
+```
